targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Capacity)
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Capacity"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
FROM Capacity
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Project in ($Project)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1)

SELECT
  Date as "time",
  Project,
  SUM((WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Average Core Usage by Provider Project and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Capacity)
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Capacity"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
FROM Capacity
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Project in ($Project)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Capacity) as "Capacity"
   FROM Capacity
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Project in ($Project)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1)

SELECT
  Date as "time",
  Site,
  SUM((WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Average Core Usage by Site and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  Site,
  SUM((WallDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Elapsed time (months) by Site and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  Site,
  SUM((CpuDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: CPU time (months) by Site and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    # Build up a DATETIME to use as the "time" value.
    # i.e. for (Year, Month) = (2019, 01) we want the
    #      DATETIME "2019-01-01 00:00:00"
    STR_TO_DATE(
        CONCAT(Year, "-", Month, "-01 00:00:00"),
        "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"
    ) AS "time",
    SUM(NumberOfJobs) AS "",
    SubmitHost
FROM VSuperSummaries
WHERE Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY time, SubmitHost
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    # Build up a DATETIME to use as the "time" value.
    # i.e. for (Year, Month) = (2019, 01) we want the
    #      DATETIME "2019-01-01 00:00:00"
    STR_TO_DATE(
        CONCAT(Year, "-", Month, "-01 00:00:00"),
        "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"
    ) AS "time",
    SubmitHost,
    Site,
    SUM(NumberOfJobs) as "Total Jobs"
FROM VSuperSummaries
WHERE Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY time, SubmitHost
HAVING $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time;
